about_the_game:
Build your own deck of weapons and outsmart the enemy in turn-based, one-on-one battles. Become the leader of three fighters, create a strategy and shoot! Enjoy epic landscape-destroying hits. Collect and upgrade weapon cards. Win battles and move to new arenas to unlock powerful new cards in your collection! Get chests from which you can get rare and legendary weapons and fighters! Climb the rankings in online battles or challenge a friend!

You have many options for how to destroy your enemies, and the arena changes from explosions. Create your own team of three unique fighters and choose the weapon you want to fight with. Weapons differ in their capabilities and mechanics, which makes the game even more fun. You can jump up and shoot three times in the air at once thanks to time dilation! All fighters have weaknesses and defenses to certain types of damage. Use the fighter's mana, spline, or spend a lot of mana on one powerful shot on the group or make several cheap shots but on the enemy's weaknesses?  The game combines elements of arcade, action strategy, and shooting games. You can organize a battle round with your friends online or play with a virtual opponent. You have a whole arsenal of weapons at your disposal, and it's time to use them. Have fun and enjoy the process!

WHAT'S IN STORE FOR YOU?

- Multiplayer and online games with friends: you can play with your friends, as well as against a virtual opponent. Fight and show everyone who's the best shot!

- Tactics: even online shooters can't do without strategy. Think of a battle plan! You can implement your most interesting plan and combine melee and ranged weapons, or simply unleash an armageddon on everyone;

- Locations: the coolest multiplayer games cannot do without a large-scale world. There are many different maps in the Cannon Guys universe, play in a pirate bay, frozen lands, or near a volcano;

- Characters: our online game involves many heroes with different abilities. We have prepared more than 30 fighters for you to choose from. Each of the fighters has its own character, weaknesses and defenses. Some of them take more damage from fire and some take less damage from explosions, try to create a universal team for you and conquer the rating with it.

- Progress: level up your character by sending him to the battle royale, level up your weapons and become an increasingly dangerous opponent, unleash the potential of your weapons to the maximum level. The enemy will be crushed like a worm;

- Weapons: we have prepared dozens of weapons, gadgets, magic and more for you: fireballs, rockets, teleporters, swords and shurikens. All for a fun multiplayer game!

- Fun! Funny cartoon characters from the Cannon Guys universe will give you a lot of emotions. It's especially nice when the strategy works and after accurate aiming the projectile hits the target, giving you a victory.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (32-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Stable network connection required

  • Processor: i5-2500k@3.3GHz, AMD FX 6300 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Stable network connection required
